version_description: Device mac addresses are now shown next to the name of the device in the device selection popup

Improved app premium features loading time
Added app launch screen
Added the ability to manually refresh the device awake status by long pressing on the selected device button.
Improved flow and performance of device imports

Device awake status can now be viewed for each device listed in the device selection panel
Added premium purchase page explaining details about what premium offers
When quick waking a device from the select device panel the devices awake status is refreshed
Added dark mode that is driven by the system setting for dark mode
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Added support for localization and added French as a supported language
Made application font consistent across all platforms
Fixes bug that does not grant some users premium features after purchasing premium
Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements
Updating device awake status at regular intervals to improve accuracy
Added onboarding journey that provides guidance with the app on the first launch
Added new shutdown and reboot device functionality through the use of the new "Wolow Companion" Windows 10 application that can be downloaded here: https://jackbaker.dev/apps/wolow#wolow-companion
Bug fixes and general improvements
Added sleep command for use with Wolow Companion version 1.0.1. Download here: https://jackbaker.dev/apps/wolow#wolow-companion
Improvements to Chinese translations
Updating the discover Wake on LAN link to point to the applications about page which now includes a device configuration tutorial
Added device shutdown, reboot and sleep command buttons to the app main screen
Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements
Added tutorial link on add device page to make it more obvious where to find
Added Siri Shortcut for waking up devices! More Siri Shortcuts will be available in future updates but this version includes the ability to wake up devices saved in Wolow using Siri Shortcuts.
